creditline: Gift of George L. Small, Class of 1943

titles.title: The Martyrdom of Ridley and Latimer

makers.displaymaker: Sir George Hayter, 1792–1871; born and died London, England

texts.textentryhtml: Paris (19th century); George Latimer, United States and Puerto Rico [lived ca. 1865] (19th century; by descent to Small); George Latimer Small (until 1984; gift to Princeton University Art Museum).;
